GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.15.63
GSD.description:
can: j1939: j1939_session_destroy(): fix memory leak of skbs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit 98dc8fb08299ab49e0b9c08daedadd2f4de1a2f2, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 9d71dd0c70099914fcd063135da3c580865e924c. For more details please see the references link.
